frontmatter.title: GraphQL API Designer
frontmatter.description: The GraphQL API Designer streamlines the visual creation of GraphQL APIs in Ballerina. This powerful tool simplifies understanding and navigating of complex GraphQL services and lets you browse through them effortlessly without examining the code directly.
frontmatter.keywords: ballerina, vs code extension, graphql, service, api, design
frontmatter.intro: The GraphQL API Designer streamlines the visual creation of GraphQL APIs in Ballerina. This powerful tool simplifies understanding and navigating of complex GraphQL services and lets you browse through them effortlessly without examining the code directly.

[[-165862299,"
import ballerina/graphql;

public type Profile record {|
    string name;
    int age;
    Address address;
|};

public type Address record {|
    string number;
    string street;
    string city;
|};

service /graphql on new graphql:Listener(9090) {

    // A resource method with the `get` accessor inside a `graphql:Service` represents a field in the
    // root `Query` type.
    resource function get greeting() returns string {
        return "Hello, World";
    }

}
"]]
